com.nequissimus.university.k1584.logic

Class PetriSnapshots

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nequissimus.university.k1584.logic.PetriSnapshots

  • public class PetriSnapshots
extends java.lang.Object
    Container that holds all snapshots of Petri nets as well as the current one.
